NK010(tha)031:0: phur pa lha rgyud kyi bstod pa rgyud las gsungs pa ni /
NK010(tha)031:1: h'u shin tu mi bzad dpal chen 'bar ba'i sku //
NK010(tha)031:2: zhe sdang thugs mchog nyon mongs rtsad nas gcod //
NK010(tha)031:3: chos sku ye shes mnga' brnyes gzhon nu'i tshul //
NK010(tha)031:4: rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK010(tha)031:5: dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad skyed pa'i yum //
NK010(tha)031:6: bde chen dbyings nas sprul pa'i 'byung gnas gtso //
NK010(tha)031:7: rak+sha dpal gyi sku la dgyes par 'khril //
